description: Try our easy to follow Hot Cross Bun Ice-Cream Layer Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot Cross Bun Ice-Cream Layer Cake
name: Hot Cross Bun Ice-Cream Layer Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using edges of plastic wrap, lift out cake and place on board or plate. Top cake with remaining bun tops, scoops of remaining ice-cream and drizzle generously with chocolate topping to serve.
